verses.name: 2 Chronicles 31:19
verses.text: Also of the sons of Aaron the priests, which were in the fields of the suburbs of their cities, in every several city, the men that were expressed by name, to give portions to all the males among the priests, and to all that were reckoned by genealogies among the Levites.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 31:20
verses.text: And thus did Hezekiah throughout all Judah, and wrought that which was good and right and truth before the Lord his God.
